title: Project Yasuo Boarder?
body: So do you not get a boarder if you owned project yasuo before all the project skins came out, cause if not thats pretty gay.

replies.body: I was wondering this too. Doesn't matter much really.

Hey Katarina101,

PROJECT: Yasuo does not have a First Strike loading screen.

@Riot KateyKhaos But wouldn't it be an awesome surprise for the next patch? A small texture release like that couldn't hurt so that the entire Project Team can look awesome on the loading screens and show a sign of good faith towards those who pre-emptively bought Project: Yasuo :)
